popt4jlib

Interface LocalOptimizerIntf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OptimizerIntf, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcceleratedGradientDescent, Adam, Adam4FFNN, AlternatingVariablesDescent, ArmijoBFGS, ArmijoSteepestDescent, ArmijoSteepestDescentST, DLS, DLSM, FletcherConjugateGradient, FletcherConjugateGradientST, IdentitySearchOptimizer, PDMiniBatchBackPropagation, PolakRibiereConjugateGradient, PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST, RandomDescents, SGD4FFNN

    public interface LocalOptimizerIntf
extends OptimizerIntf, java.io.Serializable
    interface for local-optimization methods (methods seeking a local minimum in the neighborhood of a "starting point" solution). Extends the java.io.Serializable interface so that implementing objects can be transported across JVMs in distributed computation.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2017

    Company:

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap getParams()
      get a copy of this object's parameters.
      LocalOptimizerIntf newInstance()
      create and return a new (empty) instance of the implementing object, that will need to set its parameters first before invoking the OptimizerIntf's minimize(f) method.

      • Methods inherited from interface popt4jlib.OptimizerIntf

        minimize, setParams
